name: Triangle Game
description: Triangle Game can be played as solitaire, against the computer, between two players on the same screen, or across the network.  Coordinates are set randomly on the screen.  Each player takes turn picking three coordinates from the screen to form a triangle.  A triangle cannot overlap any existing triangle.  When no triangle can be formed, the player who created the most number of triangles wins.  If there is a tie, the player who created the last triangle wins.
